name: Lost in Space (itch) (IrisSchuit, Pryymez)
description:
You're a cat astronaut lost in space... 

Try to avoid all the asteroids and get the highest score!

Controls

Left / Right Arrow KeysMoveDown Arrow KeyPull Rope Down

Avoid the asteroids by moving to the left and right. You will slowly move upwards into space, when the bar at the bottom of the screen changes color you can pull yourself back again. For every asteroid that passes you get points. Try to get as many points as possible and share your score in the comments!
